posts.raw_content:
The right wing must stop living within the parameters set up by liberals & leftists. If you're being called racist, SAY you don't care. Laugh and mock the person accusing you. 

They murdered Charlie and they're trying to murder Trump. There needs to be far right solutions to far left problems. 

In those countries I listed, if you're there for more than 60-90 days, you have to get medical examines done on your own dime. You have to register with the local government who will have time to check up on you. If you don't have a job, you must submit a business plan, proof of funding, and other documents for their stay authorization. As a foreigner, your bank accounts are constantly under scrutiny to make sure you're not engaged in the black market. 

In Japan and Poland, you're not entitled to an attorney who can speak your language. You have to call your embassy and figure it out with them. Police are still allowed to beat inmates who don't comply, and in Japan & Korea if you're trying to use mental health as an excuse, your sentence isn't reduced. You're actually likely to be restrained. People have been restrained for over 3+ weeks (yes, weeks) so violent criminals in those countries DO NOT fake mental illness.

In those countries I listed, if you're there for more than 60-90 days, you have to get medical examines done on your own dime. As a foreigner, your bank accounts are constantly under scrutiny to make sure you're not engaged in the black market.

In Japan and Poland, you're not entitled to an attorney who can speak your language. You have to call your embassy and figure it out with them. Police are still allowed to beat inmates who don't comply, and in Japan & Korea if you're trying to use mental health as an excuse, your sentence isn't reduced. You're actually likely to be restrained. People have been restrained for over 3+ weeks (yes, weeks) so violent criminals in those countries DO NOT fake mental illness.
